resources.string: To read, bring the device close to the NFC Tag
To write, enter the content in the field below and bring the device close to the NFC Tag
To clear, bring the device close to the NFC Tag
No content found on the NFC Tag!
The content has been successfully written to the NFC Tag!
Error writing content to the NFC Tag!
The content needs to be entered!
The content of the NFC Tag has been successfully cleared!
Error clearing the content of the NFC Tag!
The device does not support NFC technology!
